zh_CN.DialogText: 所以你想让我做什么呢？

en_US.DialogText: So what do you want me to do?

zh_CN.DialogText: 总之就是帮我干点体力活，比如拿木材钢材做点东西什么的，还有，帮我主持讨论

en_US.DialogText: In short, it is to help me do some physical work, such as making something with wood and steel, and help me preside over the discussion

zh_CN.DialogText: 当然你可以挑你有空的时候来，但是需要主持讨论的时候会来给你派任工作的。

en_US.DialogText: Of course, you can come when you are free. But, you will be assigned when you need to preside over the discussion.

zh_CN.DialogText: 话说回来你又是怎么拿到这些小零件的？

en_US.DialogText: Anyway, how did you get these small parts?

zh_CN.DialogText: 当然是其他的幸存者拿来让我帮他们修修东西，他们估计是从外面收集来的吧

en_US.DialogText: Of course, other survivors brought it to me to repair things for them. They probably collected it from outside

zh_CN.DialogText: 好吧，等我有空的时候就来帮你。

en_US.DialogText: Well, I'll help you when I'm free.

zh_CN.DialogText: 我会等你来的，另一个工作也别落下了

en_US.DialogText: I'll wait for you to come and don't leave another job behind

zh_CN.DialogText: 老工人看上去有点欢快地离开了

en_US.DialogText: The old worker looked a little cheerful and left
